biotools.summary: MATLAB library that uses constrained fuzzy logic models based on prior knowledge networks to address two questions about a biological system: 1) What perturbation results in a specified downstream effect? and 2) In what environments do those perturbations produce that effect?

bioschemas.name: Q2LM
bioschemas.summary: MATLAB library that uses constrained fuzzy logic models based on prior knowledge networks to address two questions about a biological system: 1) What perturbation results in a specified downstream effect? and 2) In what environments do those perturbations produce that effect?
